ch0048_80_gima/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I thought I’d run
into you about now.
ch0048_80_gima/0101_0701_02_10:
Battles come down to luck in the end. What kind
of luck will today bring?
ch0048_80_gima/7101_0701_01_10:
When people aren’t winning, they tend to get
frustrated and impatient.
ch0048_80_gima/7101_0701_02_10:
At times like that, the trick is to relax and enjoy
the battle.
ch0048_80_gima/7101_0701_03_10:
Fortune smiles not on those who obsess over
winning or losing. It shines on those who are
having the most fun.
ch0048_80_gima/7102_0701_01_10:
It’s said that Bisharp are so level-headed, they
don’t even change their expression when they deal
the finishing blow to their prey.
ch0048_80_gima/7102_0701_02_10:
They’re also very observant. They keep a keen eye
on their minions, ensuring none of them even
thinks about double-crossing their leader.
ch0048_80_gima/7102_0701_03_10:
Heh... As long as Bisharp and I are on the lookout,
no one’s going to pull a fast one on us.
ch0048_80_gima/7103_0701_01_10:
Every day, without fail, Bisharp will sharpen the
blade on her head.
ch0048_80_gima/7103_0701_02_10:
She’s always ready for anything—and always
capable of peak performance.
ch0048_80_gima/7103_0701_03_10: Just the perfect partner for a Trainer like me, eh?
ch0048_80_gima/7104_0701_01_10:
I almost always wear clothes that are formal and
tight fitting.
ch0048_80_gima/7104_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, though, it’s nice to wear something a
little more loose and comfortable, like this.
ch0048_80_gima/7104_0701_03_10:
If you ever feel like you want to switch things up,
a wardrobe change is a good place to start.
ch0048_80_gima/7105_0701_01_10: There are many different kinds of card players.
ch0048_80_gima/7105_0701_02_10:
For example, there are those who leave everything
to chance and go all-or-nothing. Then there are
those who carefully play the hand they’re dealt.
ch0048_80_gima/7105_0701_03_10:
I’m one of the latter kind.
What kind are you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0048_80_gima/7105_0701_04_10: I guess I’ll have to take you on and find out.
ch0048_80_gima/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s something for you. It’s just what you
needed, right?
ch0048_80_gima/1701_0702_01_10:
I’ve got a great intuition for these things.
Go on—use it however you want.
ch0048_80_gima/2501_0701_01_10:
The young and the talented have infinite potential
within them.
ch0048_80_gima/2501_0701_02_10:
I’m always really interested in how that potential
will be realized as they grow.
ch0048_80_gima/2501_0701_03_10:
I’ve definitely got my eye on you as well. I can’t
wait to see how you turn out!
ch0048_80_gima/2501_0702_01_10:
Just like a roll of the dice, no one knows what
your future will bring.
ch0048_80_gima/2501_0702_02_10:
We have unlimited potential precisely because we
don’t know our future. Even then, we still want to
know. Funny, isn’t it?
ch0048_80_gima/2511_0701_01_10: Just like the ocean, Pasio is come one, come all.
ch0048_80_gima/2511_0701_02_10:
I think that’s why there are so many sync pairs
with their own unique flair here on Pasio.
ch0048_80_gima/2511_0701_03_10:
I’d say that both you and I fit that description
pretty well.
ch0048_80_gima/2511_0702_01_10:
I don’t know if Pasio called me to it or if it was
I who was drawn to Pasio.
ch0048_80_gima/2511_0702_02_10:
Either way, I was able to meet sync pairs like you
and all the others.
ch0048_80_gima/2511_0702_03_10:
I think I’ll stay here for a while and see how you
and all the other young, promising Trainers
turn out.
ch0048_80_gima/3001_0701_01_10:
I’m not really a morning person...
I tend to stay up late battling, most nights.
ch0048_80_gima/3003_0701_01_10:
I study new moves during the day—and then
battle with them at night. That’s my style.
ch0048_80_gima/3005_0701_01_10:
Some people say nights are calm and relaxing, 
but for a thrill seeker like me, they get the
blood pumping.
